root.name: Pro Cycling Manager: Season 2011
root.description: OverviewPro Cycling Manager: Season 2011 is, as its title suggests, a cycling management game where players lead their team of cyclists through the year's biggest races such as the Tour de France. Developed by Cyanide Studio and published by Focus Home Interactive, the 2011 edition features a number of overhauls in terms of graphics and user interface. Players can choose to take part in single races or manage their team over the course of the season, looking after various aspects such as the team's organisation, finances and relationships with sponsors.
